thread.title: Thalaivasal Vijay Turns Sai Baba in His Next
thread.title_full: Thalaivasal Vijay Turns Sai Baba in His Next

title: Thalaivasal Vijay Turns Sai Baba in His Next
text:
Photos 
Actor Vijay is back in the news. He shot into fame with his film Thalaivasal (1992), and is now doing a film on Shirdi Sai Baba titled, Aboorva Mahan. Interestingly, the film, which is on the life of Sai Baba, will see the Vijay playing the role of the saint. Directed by Manimuthu, the film also features actor Vinu Chakravarthy, who has not been seen on screen for a long time. The industry buzz is that after the unit completed the film, they were on the lookout for a date to release the film, and finalised on October 22. A friend of the director is believed to have pointed out to him later that October 22 is the day that Sai Baba had attained Jeeva Samadhi.
